goal.en: 1. To cultivate students’ writing abilities. 2. To guide students to understand research ethics. 3. Students learn to conduct research indepently.
goal.ch: 一、培養學生論文寫作的能力。 二、指導學生認識研究倫理的內涵。 三、建立學生獨立研究的素養。
